lead_paragraph: Liverpool beat Newcastle, 3-0, to stay 3 points behind Manchester United in the English Premier League title race. Liverpool’s 22nd victory of the season gives it 77 points from 35 games.
snippet: Liverpool beat Newcastle, 3-0, to stay 3 points behind Manchester United in the English Premier League title race. Liverpool’s 22nd victory of the season gives it 77 points from 35 games.
